content.text:
[@dominic](@EMovhfIrFk4NihAKnRNhrfRaqIhBv1Wj8pTxJNgvCCY=.ed25519) Speaking of: %KveHEJJ4oYqKiw3biSLIre4TQOtLEP3ZQ32qMXmlHKM=.sha256

How do you like Firefox on mobile? I jumped ship from Chrome OS with all Google everything, but WebKit and Blink seem like much stronger technologies than Gecko (maybe Servo + Oxidation will fix that). I'm also hesitant of the opt-out Pocket integration, which makes me wonder what the solution is (whether that's #firefox, #chromium, #dillo, or others).
